typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	schema as string,
	tablename as string
}
source(output(
		EmailType as string,
		SendToEmail as string,
		CCToEmail as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FileName') ~> ODSEmailConfig
ODSEmailConfig filter(EmailType!='') ~> Filter
Filter derive(UpdateTime = currentTimestamp(),
		FileName = split(FileName,'/')[4]) ~> select
select sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		AccountOwnerId as string,
		AccountName as string,
		ServiceAdministratorId as string,
		SubscriptionId as long,
		SubscriptionGuid as string,
		SubscriptionName as string,
		Date as date,
		Month as long,
		Day as long,
		Year as long,
		Product as string,
		MeterId as string,
		MeterCategory as string,
		MeterSubCategory as string,
		MeterRegion as string,
		MeterName as string,
		ConsumedQuantity as double,
		ResourceRate as double,
		ExtendedCost as double,
		ResourceLocation as string,
		ConsumedService as string,
		InstanceId as string,
		ServiceInfo1 as string,
		ServiceInfo2 as string,
		AdditionalInfo as string,
		Tags as string,
		StoreServiceIdentifier as string,
		DepartmentName as string,
		CostCenter as string,
		UnitOfMeasure as string,
		ResourceGroup as string,
		ID as integer,
		InsertTime as timestamp,
		FileName as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:[("Truncate table {$schema}.{$tablename}")],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
